Desc.entry: The Sheffield Pride Committee is a voluntary organisation which aims to promote the visibility of the Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual and Transgendered individuals, couples and families who live in Sheffield. Works together to organise Sheffield's largest free live music event for the LGBT community in South Yorkshire. The committee are responsible for organising, co-ordinating and fundraising for the annual Sheffield Pride event.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various venues and times, please contact for details
